subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: More than 130 players will spill into the N.B.A.’s free-agent market. That makes at least 130 new pawns in the N.B.A.’s real off-season game: the hunt for Kevin Garnett.
